race.dragonminez.alien.desc: A powerful alien warrior race with incredible physical strength and resilience. Masters of raw combat power, their bodies are naturally forged for battle.
skill.dragonminez.ultrainstinct.desc: Progressive Ultra Instinct route: Sign, Mastered, Autonomous (manga), and True (manga).
message.unofficialdmzaddon.ultra_instinc: Ultra Instinct Sign requires very low health to awaken.
Mastered Ultra Instinct requires Sign active, enough Sign mastery, and lower health.
Ultra Instinct (Autonomous) requires Mastered UI active, enough Mastered mastery, and lower health.
True Ultra Instinct requires Autonomous UI active, enough Autonomous mastery, and near-critical health.
Beast Form needs SSJ3 active, high SSJ3 mastery, and battle-damage rage.
Orange Form needs Super Namekian mastery and very high Ki reserves.
Black Form needs Fifth Form mastery and heavy battle pressure.
